title: The tech helping to bring you your morning coffee
description: How Brazil, the world's largest grower of coffee, is turning to technology to boost production.

title: Chess robot breaks seven-year-old boy's finger during Moscow Open
description: The child was trying to make his next move at the Moscow Open when the robot grabbed him.

title: China launches second module for its space station Heavenly Palace
description: Tiangong or Heavenly Palace is scheduled to be operational by the end of 2022.
